task_id.description: Unique ID used to identify the task in the system

startedAtTime.description: Task start time stamp. W3C PROV UTC dateTime

endedAtTime.description: Task finish time stamp. W3C PROV UTC dateTime

active.description: Is the current task active or not

breakpoint.description: Add a breakpoint for the task. The workflow will only continue if explicitly instructed

status.description: The status of the current task

retry_count.description: Number of times the task should be resubmitted when it failed

input_data.description: All required input and optional configuration to the service as key/value pairs

output_data.description: All output returned by the task

store_output.description: Store the output of the task to disk
